divs: sighting detailswhile trying to take a picture of our resident turkey buzzards soaring overhead, a shiny cigar shaped\cylindrical object appeared moving from the southeast. as i had my camera in hand, i continued to photograph the event. i have at least 5 pictures where i can find the object, but i continued taking pictures through the trees. i can't find the object in these other pictures, but will try to look at them more carefully. in reference to the 3rd question to my left, i didn't know what it was. my wife who had called me out to view the buzzards, thought it may be a glider. after the sighting, i immediately loaded the pictures into my computer so we could take another look. the pictures disclosed something that was mildly disturbing. the cigar shaped\cylindrical object went from moving parallel to the ground to vertical to the ground in the 4th & 5th of the 5 pictures. we both lost track of the object as it passed behind the hill and trees to the north of our property. to conclude, i'd like to say that the sky was slightly cloudy with a late afternoon sun. the pictures where taken from the north corner of my back porch with a nikon coolpix 885 with a wide angle converter. the included pictures are the last 3 of the 5 pictures i took. they show, i think, the change in direction and a drop in altitude.
Summary: southeast to northeast direction, no sound, no trail, fairly low to ground, disturbing pics
trends: There have been no other sightings in Eddyville
This sighting has never been favorited.
